greetings: Hey guys! Time to stretch a bit!
Are you insane? That back must be killing you!
facts: The part of the brain that processes movement is the same part of the brain that processes learning.
Exercise works similar to medication in treating anxiety and depression, but with less side effects.

videos.name: Active pauses for kids - If they can do it you can do it too

quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

quotes.quote: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden
